question: What is the theme of the 2019 World Malaria Day (WMD)?
option3: Sustain Gains, Save Lives: Invest in Malaria
option4: Invest in the future: defeat malaria
explanation: The World Malaria Day (WMD) is observed every year on 25th of  April to raise awareness and funds for the treatment and prevention of the disease. The day also highlights the need for sustained investment and political commitment for malaria prevention, control and elimination. As part of the WMD 2019, the  World Health Organisation (WHO) has launched grassroots campaign ‘Zero malaria starts with me’ to keep malaria high on the political agenda, mobilize additional resources, and empower communities to take ownership of malaria prevention and care.
